DOC.brief_summary: This study examine possible risk factor regard complication follow pacemaker implantable defibrillator cardioverter ( ICD ) implantation .
DOC.brief_title: Complications Following Pacemaker Implantable Defibrillator Cardioverter ( ICD ) Implantation Denmark
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine possible risk factor regard complication follow pacemaker implantable defibrillator cardioverter ( ICD ) implantation . Furthermore validation af Danish Pacemaker ICD Register conduct .
DOC.criteria: patient receive cardiac device ( pacemaker , cardiac resynchronization therapy ( CRT ) implantable defibrillator cardioverter ( ICD ) ) , undergo reoperation
